variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 1.00% on the portion of income up to $10,756. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 2.00% on the portion of income over $10,756 up to $25,499. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 4.00% on the portion of income over $25,499 up to $40,245. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 6.00% on the portion of income over $40,245 up to $55,866. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 8.00% on the portion of income over $55,866 up to $70,606. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 9.30% on the portion of income over $70,606 up to $360,659. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 10.30% on the portion of income over $360,659 up to $432,787. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_8
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 8: 11.30% on the portion of income over $432,787 up to $721,314. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_9
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 9: 12.30% on the portion of income over $721,314 up to $1,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_10
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 10: 13.30% on the portion of income over $1,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_10 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all ten brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
